sets.set_reasoning: The Overhead Cable Triceps Extension is chosen for its effectiveness in targeting the long head of the triceps, which is crucial for achieving the user's goal of thicker triceps. With 3 sets, this exercise provides sufficient volume for a beginner, aligning with the wiki's recommendation of 3-6 sets per muscle group per session.

exercises.weight: Select a weight that allows for 10-12 reps with good form, typically around 50-60% of 1RM.
exercises.alternative_exercise_weight: Use a resistance band that provides similar tension to the cable setup.

sets.set_reasoning: Skull Crushers are included to further target the long head of the triceps, providing a different angle and stretch. This complements the previous exercise and ensures comprehensive triceps development. The volume is kept at 3 sets to fit within the beginner's recommended range.

exercises.weight: Choose a weight that allows for 10-12 reps with good form, typically around 50-60% of 1RM.
exercises.alternative_exercise_weight: Select dumbbells that allow for 10-12 reps with good form, typically around 50-60% of 1RM.

sets.set_reasoning: Although the user did not specify a goal for shoulders, including a shoulder exercise ensures balanced development and supports overall upper body strength. The volume is kept minimal to fit within the time constraint and beginner guidelines.

exercises.weight: Select a weight that allows for 10-12 reps with good form, typically around 50-60% of 1RM.
exercises.alternative_exercise_weight: Choose dumbbells that allow for 10-12 reps with good form, typically around 50-60% of 1RM.

sets.set_reasoning: A second shoulder exercise, such as lateral raises, is included to target the lateral deltoids, ensuring balanced shoulder development. This complements the shoulder press and fits within the beginner's volume guidelines.

exercises.alternative_exercise_weight: Use a cable machine with a weight that allows for 10-12 reps with good form.

workout_explanation: This workout plan is structured to fit within a 30-minute time frame, focusing on the user's goal of thicker triceps while also including shoulder exercises for balanced development. The exercises are selected based on their effectiveness and suitability for a beginner, with a focus on compound movements and high-tension positions. The volume and rest times are optimized to fit the user's experience level and time constraints, ensuring a safe and effective workout session.
